name: FindMetadataTemplate
description:
Retrieve metadata template details by ID.

Use this tool to find and retrieve details of a metadata template by searching for the ID of a template instance.

parameters.name: metadata_instance_id
parameters.description: The ID of the metadata template instance to retrieve details for.

value_schema.description: The ID of an instance of the metadata template to find.

parameters.name: pagination_position_marker
parameters.description: Defines the starting position for marker-based pagination results. Requires `usemarker` to be `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: items_per_page_limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of items to return per page for pagination purposes.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: metadata_instance_id
parameters.description: The ID of an instance of the metadata template to find.

value_schema.description: The ID of an instance of the metadata template to find.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
